caseTitle: 3rd and 10th fornightly progress report in ISAF Containers Scam
tagline: Report be obtained from the Federal Tax Ombudsman (“FTO”) as well as Chairman, Federal Board of Revenue (“FBR”) as to the extent of the implementation by the department of the recommendations of FTO, given in response to a reference in terms of section 9 of the Establishment of the Office of Federal Tax Ombudsman Ordinance, 2000 in suo moto case pertaining to the ISAF Container Scam.
